Affirm |San Francisco, CA |Onsite

CEO Max Levchin, Cofounder of PayPal Nathan Gettings, Cofounder, Cofounder of Palantir Affirm, the next generation financial services company, offers installment loans to consumers at the point of sale with partnership with merchants. We enable people to take out simple loans and turn any purchase into a monthly payments, 3, 6 or 12 months. All the pricing through us is adaptive based on data that prices marginal risk in real time and generates a risk score for every transaction, so every aspect of taking out the loan is completely transparent. Full stack in Consumer Product team - We're looking for Android engineer and BE engineers (Python). Infrastructure, Automation, Site Reliability Engineering- We're looking for anyone with strong systems and infrastructure background who cares for automation, scale, monitoring, etc. Backend Platform - Backend engineers who cares passions for building robust web distributed systems.

*We are hiring experienced engineers, from 3+ years to tech lead/hands on manager.

Please feel free to reach me at kit@affirm.com if you're interested in learning more. Max being featured on Mad Money. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0zQEuc8_4Ag https://jobs.lever.co/affirm www.affirm.com
